title: Shikabane Shoujo to Kakanai Gaka
original_name: しかばね少女と描かない画家
sinopse:
Everything happened after the death of a genius lady painter. The Professor, who could not give up her talent to nothingness, planted her soul into a young girl's corpse.

Youth painter Nell is then asked to teach the girl, "Lily," how to paint. The undying girl and the shut-in youth painter; the peaceful days of these two wandering in the ravine between life and death are...

(Source: Oblivion Lumiere)
